title: Double 2048
text: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! How to play:Use your arrow keys to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one! Double 2048 Added by Baiqiang. Created by Gabriele Cirulli. Based on 1024 by Veewo Studio and conceptually similar to Threes by Asher Vollmer.
